meanings.definition: At all times; on every occasion
meanings.sent1: She always wears her favorite hat.
meanings.sent2: He sings along to his favorite song always.
meanings.sent3: The cat always jumps on the table when no one is looking.
meanings.sent4: Her smile always lights up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The sun always rises in the east without fail.

meanings.sent1: He always helps his friends in need.
meanings.sent2: She always brings a book to read in every situation.
meanings.sent3: The dog always barks at the mailman, no matter what.
meanings.sent4: His determination always shines through like a guiding star.
meanings.sent5: The flowers always bloom beautifully in every season.

meanings.sent1: The river flows always, never stopping.
meanings.sent2: The clock ticks always, marking the passing time.
meanings.sent3: The wind always whispers secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter always rings out like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The waves always crash against the shore, a never-ending dance.

meanings.definition: In a direction away from a particular place
meanings.sent1: The children ran always from the haunted house.
meanings.sent2: The birds flew always from the stormy clouds.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel always scurries away from the noisy lawnmower.
meanings.sent4: The ship sailed always towards the open sea, leaving the harbor behind.
meanings.sent5: The hikers always trek away from the city, seeking the quiet of nature.
